net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api

Interface UiDisplay

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttributeReadSizeInPixel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUiDisplay, UiDisplayGwt, UiDisplayTestImpl

    public interface UiDisplay
extends AttributeReadSizeInPixel
    This is the interface for the display where the UI objects are shown.
    ATTENTION:
    Be aware of multi-monitor setups. This object will represent the main screen OR the current screen where the UiWidgetMainWindow is located. This can depend on the underlying implementation or in case of a web-application on the browser.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
    See Also:
    UiContext.getDisplay()

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.attribute.AttributeReadSizeInPixel

        getHeightInPixel, getWidthInPixel
